item.title: 新加坡起诉三人人工智能芯片欺诈案休庭至 8 月 22 日
item.description: 新加坡法院周五裁定，当地媒体报道的三名男子涉嫌从新加坡向中国人工智能公司 DeepSeek 非法转移英伟达（Nvidia）人工智能芯片的案件将延期至 8 月 22 日。【原文：Singapore's case against three men linked by local media to the illegal transfer of Nvidia's AI chips from Singapore to Chinese artificial intelligence firm DeepSeek has been adjourned until Aug 22, the court ruled on Friday.】

item.title: 美国将在年底前完成石油储备交付
item.description: 美国能源部（Department of Energy）周四表示，由于维修原因，美国要到今年年底才能完成向战略石油储备（Strategic Petroleum Reserve）交付原油的计划，比原定计划晚了七个月之多。【原文：The U.S. will not complete scheduled deliveries of crude oil into the Strategic Petroleum Reserve until the end of the year due to maintenance, as much as seven months behind schedule, the Department of Energy said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国 5 月工业利润再次出现大幅下滑
item.description: 面对更广泛的经济压力和与美国之间脆弱的贸易休战，工厂放缓了生产活动，导致中国 5 月份的工业利润再次出现同比大幅下滑。【原文：China's industrial profits swung back into a sharp decline in May from a year earlier, as factories slowed activity in the face of broader economic stress and a fragile trade truce with the United States.】

item.title: 软银致力于成为领先的 "人工超级智能 "平台提供商
item.description: 软银集团首席执行官孙正义周五表示，他希望该投资集团在未来 10 年内成为 "人工超级智能 "的最大平台提供商。【原文：SoftBank Group CEO Masayoshi Son said on Friday that he wants the investment group to become the biggest platform provider for "artificial super intelligence" within the next 10 years.】

item.title: 美联储独立性受到威胁，股市反弹但美元走软
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市追随华尔街的涨势创下了三年多来的最高水平，尽管美元因对美联储独立性的担忧和提前降息的预期而挣扎。【原文：Asia shares hit their highest level in more than three years on Friday as they tracked a Wall Street rally, though the dollar struggled on concerns about the Federal Reserve's independence and expectations for early rate cuts.】

item.title: 台湾将对中国啤酒和钢铁征收为期四个月的反倾销税
item.description: 台湾财政部周五表示，将从 7 月 3 日起对中国产啤酒和热轧钢征收为期四个月的反倾销税，理由是这对台湾产业造成了实质性损害。【原文：Taiwan's finance ministry said on Friday it would impose anti-dumping duties on Chinese-made beer and hot-rolled steel for four months starting on July 3, citing substantial damage to Taiwan's industry.】

item.title: 小米新款 YU7 电动 SUV 订单激增，股价跃升至历史新高
item.description: 在新款 YU7 电动运动型多用途车上市后的头几个小时内，小米公司就获得了比预期更多的订单，使该公司股价上涨 8%，创下历史新高。【原文：Xiaomi won more orders than expected for its new YU7 electric sports utility vehicle in the first hours after it went on sale, sending the company's shares up 8% to an all-time high.】

item.title: 交易员押注美国降息，美元徘徊在 3 年半低点附近
item.description: 周五，美元兑欧元和英镑汇率在3年半以来的最低水平附近徘徊，交易员们押注美国将进一步降息，同时在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统征收关税的7月最后期限到来之前等待贸易协议的达成。【原文：The dollar drifted on Friday, hovering near its lowest level in 3-1/2 years against the euro and sterling, as traders wagered on deeper U.S. rate cuts while awaiting trade deals ahead of a July deadline for President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 中东供应风险减弱，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于伊朗和以色列的停火协议得以维持，缓解了人们对中东供应风险的担忧，石油价格本周将有所下跌，不过，由于美国夏季驾车季节燃料需求增加，石油价格周五有所上涨。【原文：Oil was set to fall this week with the Iran-Israel ceasefire holding and easing concerns over Middle East supply risks, although prices rose on Friday as the summer driving season ramped up fuel demand in the United States.】

item.title: 韩国 6 月出口将出现反弹，但关税不确定性影响出口
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，继5月份出口下降之后，韩国6月份的出口很可能因强劲的科技需求而反弹，尽管经济学家们在美国关税政策的不确定性面前仍持谨慎态度。【原文：South Korea's exports likely rebounded in June on the back of strong tech demand, following a decline in May, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, though economists remain wary amid uncertainty over U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯关闭 MyDeal 客户网站以减少损失
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的连锁超市伍尔沃斯（Woolworths）周五宣布，计划在 9 月底前关闭其控股的客户网站 MyDeal，以减少市场业务的运营亏损。【原文：Australia's largest supermarket chain Woolworths on Friday announced plans to close its majority-owned customer website MyDeal by the end of September, in an effort to reduce operating losses in its marketplace business.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称需要进一步明确关税对通胀的影响
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周四表示，最近的美国通胀数据 "相当积极"，但关税的部分通胀效应可能只是被推迟了。【原文：Recent U.S. inflation data has been "quite positive" but some of the inflationary effect of tariffs may just be delayed, Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari said on Thursday.】

item.title: 高盛分析师称，石油市场反映出供应中断的可能性很小
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）分析师在周四的一份报告中说，期权市场表明，在伊朗-以色列停火后，霍尔木兹海峡石油流通中断的可能性仅为 4%。【原文：Options markets suggest the probability of a disruption of oil flows through the Strait of Hormuz is just 4% following the Iran-Israel ceasefire, Goldman Sachs analysts said in a note on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本首都核心通胀放缓，但仍高于日本央行目标
item.description: 由于水电费的临时削减，日本首都的核心消费通胀率在 6 月份大幅放缓，但仍远高于央行 2% 的目标，使市场对进一步加息的预期保持活力。【原文：Core consumer inflation in Japan's capital slowed sharply in June due to temporary cuts to utility bills but stayed well above the central bank's 2% target, keeping alive market expectations for further interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 由于关税影响，英国 5 月份汽车产量连续第五个月下降
item.description: 周五的行业数据显示，由于工厂停工和美国关税对汽车制造商造成的影响，5月份英国汽车产量连续第五个月环比下降。【原文：Britain's vehicle production declined from a year ago for the fifth successive month in May, industry data showed on Friday, as factory disruptions and U.S. tariffs weighed on automakers.】

item.title: 香港股票资本市场上半年反弹，Shein IPO迫在眉睫
item.description: 2025 年上半年，在全球投资者更加关注中国的推动下，香港的股票资本市场活动重新活跃起来，因为香港正在等待下半年可能举行的申银万国首次公开募股。【原文：Hong Kong's equity capital markets activity roared back to life in the first half of 2025, driven by global investors sharpening focus on China as the city awaits the possible Shein initial public offering in the second half.】

item.title: 夏威夷航空公司遭受网络攻击
item.description: 夏威夷航空公司（Hawaiian Airlines）周四表示，该公司的部分 IT 系统因黑客攻击而中断，但其航班仍在按计划运行。【原文：Hawaiian Airlines said on Thursday that some of its IT systems were disrupted by a hack, adding its flights were operating as scheduled.】

item.title: 汽车制造商希望美国加快制定自动驾驶汽车规则的步伐
item.description: 随着新的机器人出租车测试不断扩大，主要汽车制造商希望国会和特朗普政府加快步伐，以便更容易部署无需人工控制的自动驾驶汽车。【原文：Major automakers want Congress and the Trump administration to move faster to make it easier to deploy autonomous vehicles without human controls as new robotaxi tests expand.】

item.title: 独家报道卫星化工和温玛公司收到美国政府信函，阻止在中国卸载乙烷
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，乙烷贸易商 Satellite Chemical USA 和 Vinmar International 已收到美国政府信函，允许他们在驶往中国的船只上装载乙烷，但禁止未经授权在中国卸载乙烷。【原文：Ethane traders Satellite Chemical USA and Vinmar International have received U.S. government letters allowing them to load ethane on vessels destined for China but prohibiting unloading ethane in China without authorization, sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司称 "星际飞船 "爆炸后碎片回收工作受阻
item.description: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）周四表示，上周 "星际飞船 "爆炸后的碎片回收工作受到阻碍，该公司已寻求墨西哥的合作，墨西哥总统已提出对该公司采取法律行动的可能性。【原文：SpaceX said on Thursday its debris recovery efforts after last week's Starship explosion have been hindered and it has sought cooperation from Mexico, whose president has raised the possibility of legal action against the company.】

item.title: J.M. Smucker 将在 2027 年底前去除人工食品染料
item.description: Jif花生酱生产商J.M. Smucker周四表示，将在2027年底之前从所有消费食品中去除合成食用色素。【原文：Jif peanut butter maker J.M. Smucker said on Thursday it would remove synthetic food colors from all consumer food products by the end of 2027.】

item.title: 联合健康任命新首席执行官管理医疗服务部门
item.description: 根据一份公司内部备忘录，联合健康集团的医疗服务部门 Optum Health 将由 Patrick Conway 领导。【原文：UnitedHealth Group's health services segment, Optum Health, will be led by Patrick Conway, according to an internal company memo.】

item.title: 交易日 市场 "火热 "运行
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美国对中国制造商品的需求因关税担忧而减弱；海运费下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收 145% 的关税后，进口反弹不及预期，从中国运往美国的集装箱运费自本月初以来下降了一半以上。【原文：Rates for shipping cargo containers from China to the U.S. have dropped by more than half since earlier this month, as imports rebounded less than expected after the slump that followed President Donald Trump slapping 145% tariffs on China.】

item.title: Blackstone 从 Atlantic Union Bankshares 购买 20 亿美元的 CRE 贷款
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Blackstone 周四表示，已从 Atlantic Union Bankshares 购买了价值近 20 亿美元的商业房地产贷款。【原文：Alternative asset manager Blackstone has bought commercial real estate loans worth nearly $2 billion from Atlantic Union Bankshares , the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 在医疗保险举报人诉讼案中，CVS 部门被勒令支付 9500 万美元
item.description: CVS Health 的药房福利管理部门必须向美国政府支付 9500 万美元，因为联邦法官裁定该部门多收了医疗保险处方药的费用。【原文：CVS Health's pharmacy benefit manager unit must pay the U.S. government $95 million after a federal judge found it overcharged Medicare for prescription drugs.】

item.title: Revolut 将收购法国巴黎银行旗下的阿根廷贷款公司以拓展市场
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的金融科技巨头 Revolut 周四表示，将收购法国巴黎银行在阿根廷拥有的一家当地贷款机构，这标志着这家数字银行进军拉美的最新举措。【原文：London-based fintech giant Revolut will acquire a local lender owned by BNP Paribas in Argentina, it said on Thursday, marking the digital bank's latest foray into Latin America.】

item.title: 特朗普称周三已与中国签署贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示，美国于周三与中国签署了一项与贸易有关的协议，但他没有具体说明协议的内容。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Thursday the United States signed an agreement with China on Wednesday related to trade but he did not specify what he was talking about.】

item.title: 官员称欧盟收到美国新贸易协定 "大纲
item.description: 欧洲官员周四表示，美国已向欧盟委员会提交了一份新的贸易协定提案，欧盟委员会主席已与欧盟领导人分享了该提案。【原文：The United States has presented a new proposal for a trade agreement to the European Commission, whose chief has shared it with EU leaders, European officials said on Thursday.】

item.title: 耐克季度收入降幅低于预期
item.description: 耐克公司周四公布的第四季度营收降幅小于预期，这主要得益于市场对其新产品的需求以及传统运动鞋系列的折扣。【原文：Nike reported a smaller-than-expected drop in fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, helped by demand for its newer products as well as discounts on its legacy sneaker lines.】
